text: Escape to Athena is a 1979 World War II adventure comedy movie starring Roger Moore, Telly Savalas, David Niven, Stefanie Powers, Sonny Bono, and Elliott Gould. It was directed by George P. Cosmatos, and is set during World War II is German-occupied Greek island. == Other websites == * * Category:1979 comedy movies Category:1979 war movies Category:1979 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies directed by George P. Cosmatos Category:British comedy movies Category:British war movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Greece
title: Escape to Athena
